member.name: T:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ActionMessage
member.summary: Used to send a message from the UI to a presentation model class, indicating that a particular Action should be invoked.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ActionMessage.EnforceGuardsDuringInvocation
member.summary: Causes the action invocation to "double check" if the action should be invoked by executing the guard immediately before hand.
member.remarks: This is disabled by default. If multiple actions are attached to the same element, you may want to enable this so that each individaul action checks its guard regardless of how the UI state appears.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ActionMessage.ThrowsExceptions
member.summary: Causes the action to throw if it cannot locate the target or the method at invocation time.
member.remarks: True by default.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.View.ExecuteOnLoad(Xamarin.Forms.VisualElement,Caliburn.Micro.RoutedEventHandler)
member.summary: Executes the handler immediately if the element is loaded, otherwise wires it to the Loaded event.
member.returns: true if the handler was executed immediately; false otherwise

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.View.ExecuteOnUnload(Xamarin.Forms.VisualElement,Caliburn.Micro.RoutedEventHandler)
member.summary: Executes the handler when the element is unloaded.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.View.ExecuteOnLayoutUpdated(Xamarin.Forms.VisualElement,System.EventHandler)
member.summary: Executes the handler the next time the elements's LayoutUpdated event fires.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.View.GetFirstNonGeneratedView
member.summary: Used to retrieve the root, non-framework-created view.
member.returns: The root element that was not created by the framework.
member.remarks: In certain instances the services create UI elements. For example, if you ask the window manager to show a UserControl as a dialog, it creates a window to host the UserControl in. The WindowManager marks that element as a framework-created element so that it can determine what it created vs. what was intended by the developer. Calling GetFirstNonGeneratedView allows the framework to discover what the original element was.

member.summary: Adds a default type mapping using the standard namespace mapping convention
member.param: Suffix for type name. Should be "View" or synonym of "View". (Optional)

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ViewLocator.RegisterViewSuffix(System.String)
member.summary: This method registers a View suffix or synonym so that View Context resolution works properly. It is automatically called internally when calling AddNamespaceMapping(), AddDefaultTypeMapping(), or AddTypeMapping(). It should not need to be called explicitly unless a rule that handles synonyms is added directly through the NameTransformer.
member.param: Suffix for type name. Should be "View" or synonym of "View".

member.param: RegEx replace pattern for source namespace

member.summary: Transforms a ViewModel type name into all of its possible View type names. Optionally accepts an instance of context object
member.remarks: Arguments: typeName = The name of the ViewModel type being resolved to its companion View. context = An instance of the context or null.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ViewLocator.LocateTypeForModelType
member.summary: Locates the view type based on the specified model type.
member.remarks: Pass the model type, display location (or null) and the context instance (or null) as parameters and receive a view type.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ViewLocator.LocateForModelType
member.summary: Locates the view for the specified model type.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ViewLocator.LocateForModel
member.summary: Locates the view for the specified model instance.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ViewModelBinder.BindProperties
member.summary: Creates data bindings on the view's controls based on the provided properties.
member.remarks: Parameters include named Elements to search through and the type of view model to determine conventions for. Returns unmatched elements.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ViewModelBinder.BindActions
member.summary: Attaches instances of to the view's controls based on the provided methods.
member.remarks: Parameters include the named elements to search through and the type of view model to determine conventions for. Returns unmatched elements.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.Xamarin.Forms.ViewModelBinder.HandleUnmatchedElements
member.summary: Allows the developer to add custom handling of named elements which were not matched by any default conventions.

member.summary: Binds the specified viewModel to the view.
member.remarks: Passes the the view model, view and creation context (or null for default) to use in applying binding.

member.name: T:Caliburn.Micro.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for a PropertyChangedCallback implementation that is invoked when a dependency property changes its value. Also provides event data for the Control.IsEnabledChanged event and any other event that uses the DependencyPropertyChangedEventHandler delegate.

member.name: P:Caliburn.Micro.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the dependency property after the reported change.
member.returns: The dependency property value after the change.

member.name: P:Caliburn.Micro.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the dependency property before the reported change.
member.returns: The dependency property value before the change.

member.name: P:Caliburn.Micro.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.Property
member.summary: Gets the identifier for the dependency property where the value change occurred.
member.returns: The identifier field of the dependency property where the value change occurred.
